title: Unable to Receive Game Invites
body: My favorite streamer plays with his subs. I have been unable to receive invites from him multiple times while watching him type my name in and hitting the game invite. Not sure whats going on.....he's silver 1 and i'm silver 4...

replies.body: Your client could be having a hard time communicating with the PVP.net service, which runs the communications platform that you use to chat, join, and create games. The [Connection guide ](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/201752664-Troubleshooting-Connection-Issues)on our support site addresses the most common solutions for this. Let me know if those steps caused any change.
Restart the client and let him invite you again. Let us know if this works.
